articles.title: Cartoonist Charlie Mackesy: 'Don't give up, the storm ends'
articles.description: Cartoonist Charlie Mackesy dedicated his drawings to the people on the front line tackling Covid-19.
articles.content:
Cartoonist Charlie Mackesy dedicated his drawings to the people on the front line battling against Covid-19.
His messages of hope can be seen around the UK from hospitals to schools and t-shirts.

articles.content:
